metadata.title: CVE-2023-1582 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race problem was found in fs/proc/task_mmu.c in the memory managementsub-component in the Linux kernel. This issue may allow a local attackerwith user privilege to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
